title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: QINSEN Womens Long Sleeve Crewneck Cardigan Sweater Lightweight Button Down Knit Tops Outerwear

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #68,626 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #472 in Women's Cardigans

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be a high-quality piece that feels soft and is cozy against the skin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Cardigan Sweater
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This is a lovely sweater that is soft, stretchy, and warm. The quality is outstanding. I appreciate how both comfortable and fashionable it is. The color is vibrant and it is true to size. Read more
items.author: mezecurls

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic cardigan
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I got white and I was nervous that it would show everything but it actually is the perfect fabric. This cardigan is a classic and elegant style. I got a small 130 lbs 5’1. The material gives a little stretch. Very soft and will keep me warm for those cooler nights/days Read more
items.author: Shannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO cute!!
items.body: I absolutely LOVE The quality. the cardigan is so cute and perfect for fall also is super warm and cozy! Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: AK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice cardigan
items.body: This sweater is top notch. I love the quality and feel of it. It’s a medium weight knit. I bought my true size small and it is perfect. I am 5’4 and about 117 lbs. It fits snugly when buttoned which I like. If you want a looser look you might want to size up. I love this red color for the holidays and to generally brighten up my wardrobe. I think it is reasonably priced for the quality. Read more
items.author: Nancy Sohl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!!!
items.body: This is so flattering and I love the color!! It’s very thick too, feels like excellent quality Read more
items.author: Saamia Khan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality!
items.body: The color of this cardigan is stunning and it is just such quality fabric. I’m so impressed. I love the fit and the sizing seems true to size. I love this and will be wearing it on repeat. Read more
items.author: cbwaugh77

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love it!
items.body: I'm obsessed with this pink sweater. I wore it today and got so many compliments — everyone kept asking where it was from! One of my coworkers even asked for the link so she could order hers too. The fabric feels super soft and high quality, and it looks so feminine and flattering. I definitely want to get it in more colors! Read more
items.author: Mariam Melisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect staple piece!
items.body: This is the perfect staple piece! I recommend sizing up even though it is stretchy, but I love the soft material and length! the perfect thickness and feels great quality! Read more
items.author: Grace

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Pink, Beige, Black, Navy Blue, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
